title: Quarter-season Power Poll & “The Belichick Letters”
itunes:title: Quarter-season Power Poll & “The Belichick Letters”
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler – recap the action from Monday Night Football that saw a 24-10 Vikings win over the Giants in Week 4. Then, the guys break down their 2016 quarter-season power poll, and come one step closer to picking the Team of ATL. Finally, the heroes delve into Marc Sessler’s long form piece that features a young Quiet Storm, and a different side of Bill Belichick.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
